items.name: Case
items.desc:
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for all other SE London postcodes!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!
We now have cases of 24 330ml bottles available for delivery. Get your beer-lover the perfect present and choose from our epic selection of Mixed or One Beer Only boxes.
If you choose our Bespoke option, please tell us what mix of bottles you would like for your case in the 'ADD NOTE' section, in the checkout before you complete your purchase.
Please note, Mixed Cases will contain a fabulous combination of our Pale Ale, Session IPA, Lager, Brick Lane Pale and Brick Lane IPA.

items.name: Cask - Bright (Price Includes Returnable £50 Deposit)
items.desc:
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for everyone else in Lewisham and all of Southwark!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!
For more details on our delivery services click this LINK!
Please note a £50 refundable deposit (already included in price shown) is added to all cask purchases .
Our beer is live so it continues to ferment in the cask and needs at least 24 hours to settle.
If you don’t have that much time (e.g. taking the beer to a party) we can ‘Bright’ or re-rack the beer, decanting it to another cask to remove the sediment. We need to charge a little extra for bright beer as there is more work involved for us. We also need 48hrs notice for 'bright' beer. (if you need it more urgently than this please give us a ring first before ordering)
Please refer to this page when setting up your cask at home. Upon collection of your cask you will be provided with these items:
When you get your cask home, please put it somewhere cold for storage. When you are ready to use it, set up the cask on the rack, leaning forward. Take the spial and hammer it through the blue plug, then loosen the spial. Once this is done, take the cask tap and hammer into the grey plug until beer stops flowing. You are ready to go! If you have any questions, please email hello@brockleybrewery.co.uk
Spial
Hammer
Pump clip
Double sided velcro
Cask jacket
Cask tap
Cask rack

items.desc: Brockley Brewery would like to support the Black Lives Matter movement, so please add this donation to your cart and we will donate the sum of all donations to UKBLM every week.

items.name: One Drop Pale Ale
items.desc:
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for everyone else in Lewisham and all of Southwark!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!
LOVERS ROCK BEERS
Lovers Rock is a celebration of it's namesake - Britain's first homegrown reggae movement - born in Brockley, SE4.
In homage to that classic, minimalist drum beat, tantamount to reggae since it's conception, our "One Drop" is a bracing, single-minded and uncompromising Pale Ale. Brewed with a fresh, up-beat blend of Magnum, El Dorado and Rakau hops, this beer delivers a bounty of exotic fruit aromas with a crisp citrus tang of grapefruit - all delicately balanced against a light, biscuity malt backdrop.

items.name: Pale Ale
items.desc:
This delicious beer was the first beer we brewed here at Brockley and has always been a permanent fixture on cask since it's conception. For those of you that haven't tried it yet, our Pale is a timeless classic; full-bodied and bittered with a balanced bouquet of Kentish hops, giving an initial bittersweet taste, followed by hints of apricot. 4.1% ABV.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for all other SE London postcodes!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!

items.name: Porter
items.desc:
Our hearty, warming Porter derives it's deep dark colour from a combination of roasted malts, disguises an intricate and subtle mingling of rich coffee and bittersweet chocolate notes, coupled with a distinct smokey flavour. Classic, complex, malty and robust. 4.3% ABV.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!

items.name: Session IPA
items.desc:
For anyone who hasn't tried it already, our Session IPA is a shameless beer; refreshing, tangy and pungent with a tumultuous blend of bold, daring hops, delivering big fruity flavours, leading to an intense finish against a delicate malt backdrop.

items.name: Steppers Extra Stout
items.desc:
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
Free beer delivery to residents of SE4, SE12 + SE13!
£2 delivery for everyone else in Lewisham and all of Southwark!
£5 delivery for the rest of the UK!
LOVERS ROCK BEERS
Lovers Rock is a celebration of it's namesake - Britain's first homegrown reggae movement - born in Brockley, SE4.
Aptly dubbed with respect to one of the bedrock grooves in roots reggae drumming, our "Steppers" is a formidable and majestic Extra Stout. Brewed with cocoa nibs and lactose, this black beauty is rich and chocolatey with a lusciously smooth, velvet finish - perfectly balancing its subtle sweetness with an abundance of intense roasted malts.

items.name: Summer XPA Bag In Box
items.desc:
Summer XPA (4.0% ABV) - With Summer now well and truly in full swing, our Seasonal Special this year is a thirst-quenchingly delicious, full-bodied XPA (extra light pale ale).
At 4.0%, our Summer XPA is ultra sessionable, well balanced and has been dry hopped with the implacable Nelson Sauvin and Kohatu hops. These New Zealand hop varieties combine to give our Summer XPA its rich, fruity, gooseberry flavour and complex, almost white wine like character, together with a fresh, tropical aroma with notes of pine.
Product Details: https://www.brockleybrewery.co.uk/post/product-faq-1

items.name: Wheat Beer
items.desc:
We're proud to announce that we've brewed up a fresh new batch of our tremendous Wheat Beer into cans! It's a zesty, refreshing wheat beer; 4.7% ABV, hazy, full bodied and lightly hopped with Perle hops.
We've packed the brew with fresh lemon zest and fermented it using Belgian yeast, giving the beer its distinctive, but gentle, banana aroma, all set against a tangy citrus backdrop.
DELIVERY OPTIONS:
